original: Ljungblom, Per Åke Gudmar, ingenjör, Göteborg, f. 31/5/00 i Mjölby av landsfiskal Knut Engelbrekt L. o. Gudrun Sandberg. G. 30 m. Anna-Stina Beronius. Barn: Gull-Marie f. 32, Bengt-Ake 35, Lillemor 44. — Ma-skining:ex. v. Polytechn. Inst. i Stre-litz. Res. t. Tyskl. 19-23 o. USA 26- 40 32. Anst. v. American Tel & Tel Co. konstr :ibyrå i New York 26-32, repr. o. kontr. v. Malte Månson A-B i Linköp. 3S-41, repr. f. firma Specialmaskiner A-B i Gbg sed. 41. Hobbies: teckning, målning.
translated: Ljungblom, Per Åke Gudmar, engineer, Gothenburg, b. 31/5/00 in Mjölby to district fiscal Knut Engelbrekt L. and Gudrun Sandberg. M. 30 with Anna-Stina Beronius. Children: Gull-Marie b. 32, Bengt-Ake b. 35, Lillemor b. 44. - Education: graduated from Polytechn. Inst. in Stre-litz. Traveled to Germany 19-23 and USA 26-40 32. Employed by American Tel & Tel Co. as a construction engineer in New York 26-32, representative and contractor for Malte Månson A-B in Linköping 35-41, representative for the company Specialmaskiner A-B in Gothenburg since 41. Hobbies: drawing, painting.
